book.title: Exploring the Future with Data Science
book.author: Raghav R

chapter.title: Introduction to Modern Data
chapter.text: Data has become the core element of every successful digital transformation. Organizations across the world are harnessing the power of data to make smarter decisions.

chapter.title: What is Data Science?
chapter.text: Data Science is a multidisciplinary field that uses algorithms, statistics, and machine learning to extract insights from structured and unstructured data. It helps businesses understand trends, forecast demand, and improve efficiency.

chapter.title: The Future Ahead
chapter.text: With artificial intelligence and automation growing rapidly, the importance of data science will continue to rise. The demand for skilled professionals in this field is expected to grow exponentially.
